name: Mass Effect 3 Coalesced Mod Manager
short_description:
Mass Effect 3 Coalesced Mod Manager is no longer maintained on sourceforge, however it is still under development. Download it at http://me3tweaks.com/tools/modmanager.

Mass Effect 3 Coalesced Mod Manager makes swapping Coalesced.bin files easy for Mass Effect 3, including ones in DLC, which make it easy to install and remove mods. Coalesced.bin files contain many variables related to game functions, allowing you to be able to change things like waves, weapon damages, store functions in singleplayer, and many other aspects of the game. This project makes managing these files easy and effecient, with as little as 3 clicks to install a mod and begin playing the game.

Requires Mass Effect 3 (patch 3 or higher) and Java 1.7 or higher.

The binary distribution (under versions) uses ME3Explorer. You can see the SourceForge of that page here: https://sourceforge.net/projects/me3explorer/

Mass Effect 3 is a trademark of Bioware, a subsidy of Electronic Arts (EA)
summary: ME3CMM is a mod manager for Mass Effect 3.
